TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConcurrentBag`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Concurrent.IProducerConsumerCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class ConcurrentBag(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T), IProducerConsumerCollection(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T)

generic <typename T> public ref class ConcurrentBag : System::Collections::Concurrent::IProducerConsumerCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 要儲存在集合中的項目類型。

span.span: The type of the elements to be stored in the collection.

summary.span: 代表安全執行緒的未排序物件集合。

span.span: Represents a thread-safe, unordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包適合用於儲存物件，當順序並不重要，且不同於集包重複項目。Bags are useful for storing objects when ordering doesn't matter, and unlike sets, bags support duplicates. 是安全執行緒包實作，適用於案例，其中在相同的執行緒會同時產生並使用儲存在屬性包中的資料。 is a thread-safe bag implementation, optimized for scenarios where the same thread will be both producing and consuming data stored in the bag. 接受`null`做為參考類型的有效的值。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[常見問題集： 是的新並行集合的所有無鎖定？](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2010/01/26/9953725.aspx)中平行程式設計.NET 部落格。For more information, see the entry [FAQ: Are all of the new concurrent collections lock-free?](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2010/01/26/9953725.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入和移除項目:The following example shows how to add and remove items from a : [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentbag/cs/concbag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentBag#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.concurrentbag/vb/concbag.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有的 public 和 protected 成員的是安全執行緒，且可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 不過，透過其中一個介面存取成員實作，包含擴充方法不保證是安全執行緒，而且可能需要由呼叫端同步。

span.span: However, members accessed through one of the interfaces the implements, including extension methods, are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得 中所包含的項目數。

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的計數表示目前時間的快照集的屬性包內容。The count returned represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the bag. 可能是其他執行緒可能會加入或移除項目，只有在您存取之後，立即`Count`屬性。It is possible that other threads might add or remove items immediately after you access the `Count` property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<!T> GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator(Of T)

summary.span: 傳回在 中逐一查看的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An enumerator for the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉，代表目前時間的快照集的屬性包內容。The enumeration represents a moment-in-time snapshot of the contents of the bag. 它並不會反映任何更新之後集合呼叫。It does not reflect any updates to the collection after was called. 列舉值會安全地使用並行的讀取次數，並寫入屬性包。The enumerator is safe to use concurrently with reads from and writes to the bag.
